text.0_Siman, 5_Seif Katan: ...And the Arizal writes that a measure of Mishnayos [should] take precedence over everything, and through this one merits "neshama"...
text.101_Siman, 8_Seif Katan: Three steps. Look at the Magen Avraham.  And it is obvious that it is talking about (when the person in front) is within 4 Amos (of the person behind), or if he will enter the 4 Amos by stepping the three steps backwards, Olat Tamid.
text.622_Siman, 4_Seif Katan: Seven times. The reason is to accompany the Shechinah that rises upwards through the seven heavenly firmaments.

work: Ba'er Hetev on Shulchan Arukh, Orach Chayim
